name: 4dc4fd28-bc65-573f-8cde-a3db8fe6738b
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Montseny, Spain (20170126 - 20180101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Montseny, Spain (20170126 - 20180101)
